name: Jiffy Steak Company, Appellant, v. Richards

casebody.head_matter:
Jiffy Steak Company, Appellant, v. Richards.
Argued October 2, 1963.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

Anthony O. Troiano, with him Pugliese & Troiano, for appellee.
November 12, 1963:
